meta.job_title: Director of Throughput and Kitchen Innovation

duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and lead throughput and kitchen innovation strategies across Taco Bell restaurants.
Partner with cross-functional teams to define the drive-thru and kitchen of the future.
Create testing infrastructure for kitchen innovations and enhancements.
Manage the ideation process and establish innovation infrastructure for restaurant innovation plan.
Identify and share innovative best practices and kitchen enhancements across the systems.

education_certification.credential: MBA or master’s degree in relevant field preferred
